channel.title: podcasts on Philomath's Lair!
channel.description: Recent content in podcasts on Philomath's Lair!

item.title: Decompiled - A tech Podcast!
item.description: This blog post is the announcement of our upcoming podcast, Decompiled! But Why a podcast? Here is why. Target audience for entire podcast Budding Developers seeking to learn about new technologies and expoloring the industry trends for them. Students to learn about Computers equipped with programming, an eye opening technology, which broadens their perspective towards things Teachers and Mentors Mostly Open Source Enthusiast, and communities Why we are starting this podcast

item.title: Podcasts?
item.description: Learning is what keep us alive. Learning should be an ongoing quest for everyone and never be put to rest in their life till the end of time. Why Podcast matter to you? Ever wanted to learn something new, to remain indulged in your passion with your day job? Make best use of your time but you don’t get any? No worries, Podcast has come to rescue you. WIth the busy daily life, we all have to live, we need to do multiple jobs at once and Face it, we are not best keeping up with all!
